days.text: Temperature falling. Dry. Cloudy apart from sunny periods. Force 4 to 5 north to northeasterly winds, occasionally force 6 with gusts.
Cold and dry. Mainly fine. Force 2 to 4 northeasterly winds.
Fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
Mainly fine. Force 2 to 3 east to northeasterly winds.
